### ðŸ“Š Example in Plotly (Python)
Hereâ€™s how you can apply these colors in a scatter plot using Plotly:

```python
import plotly.express as px
import pandas as pd

# Sample data
df = pd.DataFrame({
    'x': [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6],
    'y': [10, 15, 13, 17, 14, 16],
    'group': ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'F']
})

# Define color mapping
color_map = {
    'A': '#E0FFFF',
    'B': '#B0E0E6',
    'C': '#AFEEEE',
    'D': '#FFE4E1',
    'E': '#FFFACD',
    'F': '#D8BFD8'
}

# Plot
fig = px.scatter(df, x='x', y='y', color='group',
                 color_discrete_map=color_map,
                 title='Scatter Plot with Custom Colors')
fig.show()
```
